Use this resource to create, update, and delete a synthetics monitor in New Relic.

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

##### Type: `SIMPLE`
```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as newrelic from "@pulumi/newrelic";

const foo = new newrelic.synthetics.Monitor("foo", {
    frequency: 5,
    locations: [
        "AWS_US_EAST_1",
        "AWS_US_EAST_2",
    ],
    status: "ENABLED",
    type: "SIMPLE",
    uri: "https://example.com", // Required for type "SIMPLE" and "BROWSER"
    validationString: "add example validation check here", // Optional for type "SIMPLE" and "BROWSER"
    verifySsl: true, // Optional for type "SIMPLE" and "BROWSER"
});
```
See additional examples.

{{% /example %}}
{{% /examples %}}
## Additional Examples

Type: `BROWSER`

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as newrelic from "@pulumi/newrelic";

const foo = new newrelic.synthetics.Monitor("foo", {
    bypassHeadRequest: true, // Note: optional for type "BROWSER" only
    frequency: 5,
    locations: ["AWS_US_EAST_1"],
    status: "ENABLED",
    treatRedirectAsFailure: true, // Note: optional for type "BROWSER" only
    type: "BROWSER",
    uri: "https://example.com", // required for type "SIMPLE" and "BROWSER"
    validationString: "add example validation check here", // optional for type "SIMPLE" and "BROWSER"
    verifySsl: true, // optional for type "SIMPLE" and "BROWSER"
});
```

Type: `SCRIPT_BROWSER`

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as newrelic from "@pulumi/newrelic";

const foo = new newrelic.synthetics.Monitor("foo", {
    frequency: 5,
    locations: ["AWS_US_EAST_1"],
    status: "ENABLED",
    type: "SCRIPT_BROWSER",
});
```

Type: `SCRIPT_API`

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as newrelic from "@pulumi/newrelic";

const foo = new newrelic.synthetics.Monitor("foo", {
    frequency: 5,
    locations: ["AWS_US_EAST_1"],
    status: "ENABLED",
    type: "SCRIPT_API",
});
```

## Monitor Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) in the Programming Model docs.

### Inputs

The Monitor resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:




{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Frequency</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The interval (in minutes) at which this monitor should run.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Locations</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The locations in which this monitor should be run.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Status</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The monitor status (i.e. `ENABLED`, `MUTED`, `DISABLED`).
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The monitor type. Valid values are `SIMPLE`, `BROWSER`, `SCRIPT_BROWSER`, and `SCRIPT_API`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Bypass<wbr>Head<wbr>Request</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Bypass HEAD request.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The title of this monitor.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Sla<wbr>Threshold</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">double</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The base threshold for the SLA report.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Treat<wbr>Redirect<wbr>As<wbr>Failure</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Fail the monitor check if redirected.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The URI for the monitor to hit.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Validation<wbr>String</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The string to validate against in the response.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Verify<wbr>Ssl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Verify SSL.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>

{{% /choosable %}}


{{% choosable language python %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>frequency</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The interval (in minutes) at which this monitor should run.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>locations</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">List[str]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The locations in which this monitor should be run.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>status</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The monitor status (i.e. `ENABLED`, `MUTED`, `DISABLED`).
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The monitor type. Valid values are `SIMPLE`, `BROWSER`, `SCRIPT_BROWSER`, and `SCRIPT_API`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>bypass_<wbr>head_<wbr>request</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Bypass HEAD request.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The title of this monitor.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>sla_<wbr>threshold</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The base threshold for the SLA report.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>treat_<wbr>redirect_<wbr>as_<wbr>failure</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Fail the monitor check if redirected.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The URI for the monitor to hit.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>validation_<wbr>string</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The string to validate against in the response.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>verify_<wbr>ssl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Verify SSL.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

## Look up an Existing Monitor Resource {#look-up}

Get an existing Monitor resource's state with the given name, ID, and optional extra properties used to qualify the lookup.
{{< chooser language "javascript,typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% choosable language nodejs %}}
<div class="highlight"><pre class="chroma"><code class="language-typescript" data-lang="typescript"><span class="k">public static </span><span class="nf">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">name</span>: <span class="nx"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span><span class="p">, </span><span class="nx">id</span>: <span class="nx"><a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#ID">Input&lt;ID&gt;</a></span><span class="p">, </span><span class="nx">state</span>?: <span class="nx"><a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/newrelic/synthetics/#MonitorState">MonitorState</a></span><span class="p">, </span><span class="nx">opts</span>?: <span class="nx"><a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResourceOptions">CustomResourceOptions</a></span><span class="p">): </span><span class="nx"><a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/newrelic/synthetics/#Monitor">Monitor</a></span></code></pre></div>

The following state arguments are supported:



{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Bypass<wbr>Head<wbr>Request</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Bypass HEAD request.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Frequency</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The interval (in minutes) at which this monitor should run.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Locations</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The locations in which this monitor should be run.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The title of this monitor.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Sla<wbr>Threshold</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">double</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The base threshold for the SLA report.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Status</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The monitor status (i.e. `ENABLED`, `MUTED`, `DISABLED`).
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Treat<wbr>Redirect<wbr>As<wbr>Failure</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Fail the monitor check if redirected.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The monitor type. Valid values are `SIMPLE`, `BROWSER`, `SCRIPT_BROWSER`, and `SCRIPT_API`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The URI for the monitor to hit.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Validation<wbr>String</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The string to validate against in the response.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Verify<wbr>Ssl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    <dd>{{% md %}}Verify SSL.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The monitor status (i.e. `ENABLED`, `MUTED`, `DISABLED`).
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>treat<wbr>Redirect<wbr>As<wbr>Failure</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/boolean">boolean</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Fail the monitor check if redirected.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The monitor type. Valid values are `SIMPLE`, `BROWSER`, `SCRIPT_BROWSER`, and `SCRIPT_API`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The URI for the monitor to hit.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>validation<wbr>String</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The string to validate against in the response.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>verify<wbr>Ssl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/boolean">boolean</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Verify SSL.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
